remarks: A syllogism rule of inference.  The first premise is used to replace the second antecedent of the second premise.  Copy of ~ syl5 with a different proof.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-syl5.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
wl-syl5.2 $e |- ( ch -> ( ps -> th ) ) $.
wl-syl5 $p |- ( ch -> ( ph -> th ) ) $.
